Barely AutumnAlbengaTess

Since I know the drummer quite well, I got the opportunity to shoot the up-and-coming indie rock band Barely Autumn. From rehearsing in a tiny dark shed to loading the equipment in the van, and finally some nerves before going on stage at the Ancienne Belgique; I got to witness it up close.
